__e: That's strange, since you're the one that tried to kill me.
It's just that, you know, try to kill me once, shame on you...
It wasn't a dream the last time you tried to kill me.
But why would you try to kill your four-year-old little sister?
What I don't know. Why try to kill my father?

And these two you tried to kill with a car bomb.
Was that before or after you lied to my face and tried to kill his sister?
What I don't know. Why try to kill my father?
